title: Vegetarian Lasagna
instructions: Layer noodles with ricotta, spinach, and sauce. Bake for 30 minutes.

title: Vegan Lentil Soup
instructions: Cook lentils with chopped vegetables until soft. Blend if desired.

title: Gluten-Free Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon and salt, spread on toast.

title: Dairy-Free Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry chicken and vegetables in soy sauce until cooked through.

title: French Ratatouille
instructions: Saut√© vegetables and bake together in a dish until tender.

title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients and cook on a hot griddle until golden brown.

title: Vegan Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Stuff peppers with rice and bean mixture, bake with tomato sauce.
